Title: Requires laboratory test results ordered by a qualified health care professional to be reported to such professional or his or her agent, and upon request to the person to whom the test related
Summary: Requires laboratory test results ordered by a qualified health care professional to be reported to such professional or his or her agent, and upon request to the person to whom the test related.
LawCode: Add ยง576-d, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the reporting of the results of clinical laboratory services performed at the request of a qualified health care practitioner
